info.name: Bachelor's Interior design
more_info: Relevant courses: Material typology, color theory, drawing, Graphic design, Marketing, Modelling.

info.name: Technical high school
info.location: Lyceum named after academician Zarifa Aliyeva, Baku, Azerbaijan

info.name: Interior Architect
more_info: Project design from consept to technical drawings, choice of materials, creation of moodboards.
Coordination with architects and engineers for 3d modelling in Revit
Site visits with architects and engineers to analize and control design process

info.name: Project manager assistant
more_info: Interact with clients, trade proffesionals, and staff to communicate and enforce project goals and deadlines
Control completion of the phases of design, division task between designers and architects

info.name: Interior Designer
more_info: Experience in sourcing and have a through knowledge of FF&E
Manage multiple projects, ensure all project documentation is complete and accurate with deadline

info.name: Interior Architect
more_info: Development of concepts and ideas, considering client's requirements.
Development of detailed designs, often using 3dsmax or other 3D imaging software for better understanding by clientele
Assists in Architectural Interior Design working with Architects and clients to create detailed drawings

info.name: Architectural Intern
more_info: Involved in analyses of client problems in conceiving and developing architectural solutions to those problems
Researched materials to determine appropriate selection for project

info.name: Awarded scholarship by Azerbaijan Ministry of Education
Finalist in Noicons IED contest project in Azerbaijan
Thesis project "ZahAmaze" was exhibited in "Multiplied-Temporary exhibition" in MAXXI museum
Silver medal winner in Golden Byte International IT competitiion. UI/UX design
Training in Project Management IED university,Rome,Italy
Certificate of HarvardX, Course: The Architectural Immagination
Awarded grant by Youth Foundation of Azerbaijan
